text:
For OCW, this has been another 
year of great growth and learning.

We’re honing our publishing 
processes so that courses can

be posted on the OCW site more rapidly.
As we focus on enriching course content,
learners have more in-depth resources to pick and choose what they learn in a given course.
As we continue to produce more courses and resources, some of the questions on our minds are
how do we make OCW more accessible and more useful for educators and students?
How can we elevate our efforts to serve anyone interested in expanding their knowledge?

supporting their livelihood?
or their community?
We’ve started toward the right direction by improving the portability of our content.
We’re already seeing an uptick in learners coming to OCW on their mobile devices.
We want to be even more available where people are learning and that includes YouTube

and other social media channels.
We’re also making strides in
collaborating with like-minded organizations because we know we really can’t do this alone
especially if we want to effect significant change.

And really it’s our MIT faculty, the OCW 
staff, and our amazing supporters who are

helping us all along the way.
We’re grateful to all of you.

Thank you for trusting us to be 
part of your learning journey.

And thank you for believing in our 
efforts to open learning together.
